headline: Will S&P Global’s (SPGI) New Data Initiatives Signal a Shift in Its Private Markets Ambitions?
summary: S&P Global recently announced the launch of WSO Compliance Insights, an advanced compliance management and credit risk solution for private credit and CLO managers, along with the iLEVEL Snowflake integration enabling private market investors to seamlessly extract and analyze portfolio data within their Snowflake environment. These product developments highlight S&P Global’s commitment to expanding data-driven intelligence for private markets amid rising industry demand for real-time,...
